bloodmagic.poptitle: Blood Magic Spell Points System 5e Configuration
bloodmagic.form: Click the button to open Blood Magic Configuration
bloodmagic.form-hint: Here you can configure module behaviour, spell point cost and more.
bloodmagic.costLabel: Spell Points cost for Level {slotLevel} slots.
bloodmagic.spellPointsCostsNote: You don't need to change the spell point costs if you are using the default spellpoint rules on DMG (page 288).
bloodmagic.spLifeCostNote: How many Hit Points Maximum a character will lose casting a spell with his own life. This is a multiplier. ex: if set to 2 a character casting a Spell with a cost of 2 spell points will lose 4 hp max. (default:1)
bloodmagic.castedLifeDead: {ActorName} casted using his last Hit Points!
bloodmagic.castedLife: {ActorName} casted using his own life losing {hpLost} Hit Points
bloodmagic.youNotEnough: You don't have enough Hit Points to cast this spell.
